page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: Scott Road leads into Ward Crescent and there are 24 houses. They are all semi-detached and built of cement slabs in 1950. They are all council houses and belong to the Havers Estate. None of the houses have garages but they have all got gardens in the front. In the gardens were lots of flowers like poppies, roses, pinks and pansies.We saw 7 cars parked on the road and another 7 cars parked on the special space provided. In between Scott Road and Ward Crescent is a large grassy area where the children play. Two Eastern National buses serve the area and they turn round at Ward Crescent. They are Routes Nos. 300 and 309 and they run every hour from Thorley Park to the town.
